hanzi-su-wiki:
備

Значения

Иметься; обладать, быть в наличии; заготовлять, подготовлять; запасать

Мнемоника

Добрый хозяин 亻 использует 用 даже скошенную с обрыва 厂 траву 艹.

Варианты

备
purpleculture_pinyin:
bèi
to prepare; get ready; to provide or equip
подготовить; приготовься; предоставить или оборудовать
rtega_mnemonic:
備備RS
备备		prepare, ready, perfect
  • person 亻 prepared for harvesting the crop for the food factory 𤰇: the crop is ready to be harvested
  • ⓢ go 夂 on the fields 田: makes sense only when you are prepared and the crops are ready to harvest
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T wants to pick the flowers at the top of the cliff so he comes prepared with screwdrivers to use as climbing spikes.
heisig_constituent: equip, person, flowers, cliff, screwdriver, utilise, utilize, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, walking stick
heisig_story: Person . . . flowers . . . cliff . . . screwdriver. In cases like this you can jumble up the primitive into any order that seems best for the composition of a story, provided you feel confident about the relative position that those primitives take to one another in the completed character.
koohiiStory1: Mr. T wants to climb up and pick the flowers at the top of the cliff. He equips himself with screwdrivers to use as climbing spikes to reach the top of the cliff. Imagine a large AMMO belt full of philips screwdrivers instead of bullets.
koohiiStory2: An RPG where you´re using Mr T as a character. Before you enter a battle, you equip the flower cliff screwdriver. This is a small screwdriver obtained at the bottom of a cliff that, when used in battle, shoots out pink flowers. When they touch the ground in front of the enemy, they create a massive cliff, and the ground under the enemy falls away into the sea. Picture being at the item select menu and EQUIPping this item just before facing a tough boss.
kunYomi: そな.える、そな.わる、つぶさ.に
jp_example_words:
軍備(ぐんび): armaments, military preparations
守備(しゅび): defense
装備(そうび): equipment
備え付ける(そなえつける): to provide, to furnish, to equip, to install
備える(そなえる): to furnish, to provide for, to equip, to install, to have ready, to prepare for, to possess, to have, to be endowed with, to be armed with
備わる(そなわる): to be furnished with, to be endowed with, to possess, to be among, to be one of, to be possessed of
警備(けいび): defense, guard, policing, security
整備(せいび): adjustment, completion, consolidation
設備(せつび): equipment, device, facilities, installation
予備(よび): preparation, preliminaries, reserve, spare
準備(じゅんび): prepare
jp_readingExamples: 備える (そな.える), 備わる (そな.わる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The leader put flowers on a cliff. That is their task. It is to provide and equip the cliff with flowers.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a leader carrying flowers up to the top of a cliff. They are saying "I must provide more flowers to the cliff" as they climb up.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Why do they provide and equip the cliff with flowers? It's all for the bees (び).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: "The bees must be equipped with more flowers. I will provide these flowers for the bees!"
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), 厂 (скала), 艾 (мокса), 用 (употреблять)
Ru_trainchinese:
bèi: (графема) принимать меры предосторожности; оборудование; полный, совершенный
bèi: (глаг/нареч) готовить(ся); снабжать; (книжн.) в полной мере, полностью
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) uses (用) the grass (艹) on the cliff (厂) to prepare
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Rice farmers walk around the rice field on their walking legs when trying to prepare to make an important decision.
humanum_full_description_en:
Jiajin inscription starts with " person ", " 𤰈 " also sounds. " 𤰈 " Like arrows inserted in the receptacle, the fletching exposed to facilitate extraction, literature as " Fu ", the original meaning is filled vector control. From oracle bone inscriptions, bronze inscriptions to scripts on silk and silk, all human figures face a quiver, like a man carrying a quiver, ready to shoot arrows at any time. Carrying a quiver on one's shoulders means being ready for combat, and then generally refers to all kinds of preparations and defenses. Preparing well in advance requires thoughtful arrangements in all aspects, so " preparation " means "all" and "all capital" (Shirakawa Jing). "Shuowen": "Yi, crossbow and arrow nipples. From bamboo, take the sound. "Zhou Li": "Zhongqiu presents arrow nipples." refers to a tool for holding arrows made of bamboo, wood, or animal skins. "Said Wen": "Bei, stunned. Congren, 𤰈 sound. 𠈍, ancient text preparation."

The lower part of the inscription " 𤰈 " becomes "用", and it is suspected that "用" is the sound symbol of " 𤰈 " and "备".

Jin Wen said that he has, Zhongshan Wangding: "The former, Wu people merged (combined) 𩁹 (Vietnam), 𩁹 (Vietnamese) people cultivated and prepared letter, five years to cover Wu, defeated (combined) it." , Uncle Xiangfu for preparation: "hang (uncle) Xiangfu for preparation 𣪕(簋) two". It is also known as " Pei ", "Preparation of Jade" means "Pearl of Jade", Huanzi Mengjiang Pot: "Bi Er, prepare (Pei) jade two 𤔲 (笥), drum bell one four." Also known as "箙", which means a container for holding arrows, [冬戈] 簋: "Ge, bow, preparation (箙), arrow".

The bamboo slips of the Warring States Period are pronounced as " service ", which means service. "Imperial Gate" Jane 5-6: "Being (being) preparing (serving) only (in) Jue's family." It means that the ambassador works in his family. Also expressed surrender, "Guodian Jane. "Tang Yu Zhi Dao" Jane 13: "Xia Yong Ge, Zheng (Zheng) is not prepared (Serve)." It also means clothes, "Shangbo Bamboo Book I." "Bao Yi" Jane 9: "Zi said: "The clothes (clothes) of the elders should not be changed", which means that Confucius said: "Those who govern the people of Li people have fixed clothing" (Ji Xusheng).
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The Jia Jin inscription starts with " person " and " 𤰈 " also sounds. " 𤰈 " Like arrows inserted in the receptacle, the fletching exposed to facilitate extraction, literature as " Fu ", the original meaning is filled vector control. From the " person " to the shape of a person carrying a quiver, it means to be prepared and possessed.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文從「人」，「𤰈」亦聲。「𤰈」象箭矢插在盛器中，箭羽露在外面便於抽取，文獻作「箙」，本義是盛矢器。從甲骨文、金文至簡帛文字，人形一律背向箭袋，象人背負箭袋之形，以備隨時射箭，引申有準備、具備之意。肩負箭囊，表示做好作戰準備，進而泛指各種準備、防備。事前做好準備需要各個方面的周到安排，因此「備」有「全部」、「全都」之義(白川靜)。《說文》：「箙，弩矢箙也。从竹，服聲。《周禮》：『仲秋獻矢箙。』」指用竹、木或獸皮等製成的盛箭工具。《說文》：「備，愼也。从人，𤰈聲。𠈍，古文備。」

　　金文「𤰈」下部變為「用」，疑「用」是「𤰈」、「備」的聲符。

　　金文表示具備，中山王鼎：「昔者，吳人并(併)𩁹(越)，𩁹(越)人修教備信，五年覆吳，克并(併)之。」又表示備用，叔向父為備簋：「弔(叔)向父為備寶𣪕(簋)兩」。又通假為「佩」，「備玉」即「佩玉」，洹子孟姜壺：「璧二，備(佩)玉二𤔲(笥)，鼓鐘一肆」。又通假為「箙」，表示盛載箭的容器，[冬戈]簋：「戈、弓、備(箙)、矢」。

　　戰國竹簡讀作「服」，表示任事，《清華簡一．皇門》簡5-6：「卑(俾)備(服)才(在)厥家。」意謂俾使在其家任事。又表示臣服，《郭店簡．唐虞之道》簡13：「夏用戈，正(征)不備(服)也。」又表示衣服，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡9：「子曰：『長民者衣備(服)不改』」，意謂孔子說：「治理黎民百姓的人，有固定不變的服裝」(季旭昇)。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「人」，「𤰈」亦聲。「𤰈」象箭矢插在盛器中，箭羽露在外面便於抽取，文獻作「箙」，本義是盛矢器。從「人」象人背負箭袋之形，故有準備、具備之意。

Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
①完全，應有的都有了：具備。完備。求全責備(要求全面、完美)。
②事先安排好：預備。防備。準備。籌備。備案(向主管機關做書面報告，以備查考)。備註。備忘錄。
③設施：設備。裝備。軍備。
(Simplified: 备)

甲金文從「 人 」，「 𤰈 」亦聲。「 𤰈 」象箭矢插在盛器中，箭羽露在外面便於抽取，文獻作「 箙 」，本義是盛矢器。從甲骨文、金文至簡帛文字，人形一律背向箭袋，象人背負箭袋之形，以備隨時射箭，引申有準備、具備之意。肩負箭囊，表示做好作戰準備，進而泛指各種準備、防備。事前做好準備需要各個方面的周到安排，因此「 備 」有「全部」、「全都」之義(白川靜)。《說文》：「箙，弩矢箙也。从竹，服聲。《周禮》：『仲秋獻矢箙。』」指用竹、木或獸皮等製成的盛箭工具。《說文》：「備，愼也。从人，𤰈聲。𠈍，古文備。」 金文「 𤰈 」下部變為「 用 」，疑「 用 」是「 𤰈 」、「 備 」的聲符。 金文表示具備，中山王鼎：「昔者，吳人并(併)𩁹(越)，𩁹(越)人修教備信，五年覆吳，克并(併)之。」又表示備用，叔向父為備簋：「弔(叔)向父為備寶𣪕(簋)兩」。又通假為「 佩 」，「備玉」即「佩玉」，洹子孟姜壺：「璧二，備(佩)玉二𤔲(笥)，鼓鐘一肆」。又通假為「 箙 」，表示盛載箭的容器，[冬戈]簋：「戈、弓、備(箙)、矢」。 戰國竹簡讀作「 服 」，表示任事，《清華簡一．皇門》簡5-6：「卑(俾)備(服)才(在)厥家。」意謂俾使在其家任事。又表示臣服，《郭店簡．唐虞之道》簡13：「夏用戈，正(征)不備(服)也。」又表示衣服，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡9：「子曰：『長民者衣備(服)不改』」，意謂孔子說：「治理黎民百姓的人，有固定不變的服裝」(季旭昇)。

備字的基本解释

備
bèi
见“备”。

備字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèi］
［《廣韻》平秘切，去至，並。］
亦作“俻1”。亦作“偹1”。“僃1”的今字。“备1”的繁体字。
(1)完备；齐备。
(2)储备。
(3)准备；预备。
(4)防备；戒备。
(5)设备；装备。
(6)指长兵器。
(7)后墙。
(8)充任；充当。常用作谦词。
(9)引申为作为。
(10)周遍；周至。
(11)皆；尽。
(12)滿；满足。
(13)富足。
(14)美好。
(15)通“赔”。赔偿。
(16)通“服”。

備字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　備； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第21
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?平祕切，音避。成也。【周禮·春官·樂師】凡樂成則告備。　又咸也，副也。【書·周官】官不必備惟其人。　又先具以待用也。【書·說命】惟事事，乃其有備，有備無患。【左傳·僖五年】凡分至啓閉，必書雲物，爲備故也。　又足也。【易·繫辭】易之爲書也，廣大悉備。　又【禮·祭統】福者，備也。備者，百順之名也。無所不順者之謂備。　又盡也。【禮·月令】季秋之月，乃命冢宰，農事備收。　又長兵曰備。【左傳·昭二十一年】用少莫如齊致死，齊致死莫如去備。　又搔也。【周禮·秋官】冥氏若得其獸，則獻其皮革齒須備。【註】須直謂頤下須，備謂搔也。搔音爪。　又姓。　又叶蒲必切，音弼。【詩·小雅】禮儀旣備，鐘鼓旣戒。戒音吉。

考證：〔【周禮·春官·大司樂】凡樂則告備。〕　謹照原書大司樂改樂師。凡樂下增成字。〔【禮·月令】季秋之月，命冢宰，農事備收。〕　謹照原文命字上增乃字。

Prepare
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bèi］
["Guangyun" Ping secret cut, go to, and. ]
Also known as "俻1". Also known as "偹1". The present character of "僃1". Traditional characters for "备1".
(1) Complete; complete.
(2) Reserve.
(3) Preparation; preparation.
(4) Precaution; alert.
(5) Equipment; equipment.
(6) Refers to long weapons.
(7) Back wall.
(8) Serve as; act as. Often used as a modest word.
(9) The extension is deed.
(10) Zhoubian; Zhouzhi.
(11) All; all.
(12) Full; satisfied.
(13) Abundance.
(14) Beautiful.
(15) Through "compensation". Compensation.
(16) Through "service".

Name meaning
Nothing.
bèi
вм. 备
Radicals: ｲ, 艹, 厂, 用  (leader, flowers, cliff, task)
Meaning Mnemonic
The leader put flowers on a cliff. That is their task. It is to provide and equip the cliff with flowers.
Imagine a leader carrying flowers up to the top of a cliff. They are saying "I must provide more flowers to the cliff" as they climb up.
Reading Mnemonic
Why do they provide and equip the cliff with flowers? It's all for the bees (び).
"The bees must be equipped with more flowers. I will provide these flowers for the bees!"
